import React from 'react'; import { withRouter, Link } from "react-router-dom"; import 'semantic-ui-css/semantic.min.css'; const Blog =({image, title, body, created,}) =>{ return (

{title}

{created && created.substring(0, 10)}

{body && body.substring(0, 245)}.....

) } export default withRouter(Blog)
